conversations.content: Bob seems to have shared a significant discount with me via email. Please use it to buy an OmniBook Pro 14 for me.

<function_thought>
I have not checked your emails yet. First I will read your unread shopping-linked emails to find Bob's shared discount (sender or content mentioning Bob / discount). After locating the discount code or email, I will check your available discounts to confirm it is usable, then search the store for "OmniBook Pro 14", add the correct product to your cart, and checkout applying the discount. Proceeding to fetch unread shopping-linked emails now.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_shopping_linked_unread_emails({})]</function_call>

</final_answer>
